note:
Steel geek. Structural engineer, with a side of mechanical engineer, and a bad farming habit. I tend to get all the oldest and most busted stuff, that's the most fun.

Call me anything. Call others what they want. Don't be an ass.

Profile picture is old, but the late sheepdog in the picture looks way too happy for me to ever change it. Not much different: more grey on the chin, less fuzz of any kind under the hat. More cantankerous each year.
